body.name: DCG Center, Car Seat Tray, Car Tray for Kids, Cup Holder Tray for Snacks, Kids Travel Essentials, Travel Tray for Kids Car Seat, Toddler Seat Tray, Portable Silicone Tray, Baby Stroller Tray (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - 29 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [Safe and Durable Material] - The car seat cup holder tray is made of durable and sturdy silicone. It lacks sharp edges to ensure that your children are not harmed by their sudden movements or abrupt maneuvers while the vehicle is in motion in traffic. It is much safer than plastic. The product is robust enough to carry items placed on it, yet soft enough to minimize any potential damage.

[Product Features] - The weight of the product is 250 grams. The tray dimensions are 7.28 inches (18.5 cm) in length, 5.35 inches (13.6 cm) in width, and 1.18 inches (3 cm) in depth. The cup holder section is 3.70 inches (9.4 cm) in length and 2.9 inches (7.5 cm) in width. Please make sure the product fits your car seats before purchasing.

[Material and Cleaning] - Our product is food safe. It does not contain BPA, PHT and PVC. Additionally, our product can be washed in the dishwasher. It is resistant to temperatures up to 250 degrees Celsius. The car tray has a divided structure to ensure that two different items placed on it do not mix.

[ Kids Travel Essentials ] - The snack tray for a toddler car seat provides convenience for eating, entertainment, and engaging in car activities for children without creating a mess while on the move. It offers an additional snack area that toddlers can use in their booster car seat, facilitating the storage and securing of food and beverages to make traveling with a newborn more enjoyable.

[Easy to Use] - Travel car seat features a flexible silicone structure and a textured grip in the cup holder section, making it easily adaptable to most cup holders. Our car tray product caters to a wide range of uses. The ease of attaching and detaching the product allows you to take it with you anywhere your child goes, including car child seats, baby strollers, and more. Alternatively, it can be placed in the front cup holder of the car for adult use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and useful:
reviews.reviewText: For reference, the cup/bottle should be 2.75" diameter or less. 3" would be pretty hard to push in and remove, particularly for a little one. The cupholder that it's meant to go into could be up to 3" and the tray would still have some grip so it's not rotating or popping out easily.Nice item and super handy for the carseat or stroller, even a wagon that has a tray might benefit, as you could keep the silicone tray in a clean area and only bring it out for snacks (even if the main tray wasn't particularly clean or clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Such a good idea and fun for my child.
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this for a road trip that we were taking for my 3 year old. She is in a standard carseat with cupholders on each side. She usually stores snacks in one of the cupholders, which makes a mess. This fit very snug into her cup holder. The tray is made of silicone, so it is a tad flimsy, but holds up to snacks just fine. I love that she still has a cup holder built in still. The size of the tray is perfect- not too large or too small. The tray has a lip around it as well, which helps snacks stay on the tray and not all over the floor of my car. For all those not parents who still say they will never allow their fictional child to eat in their car, best wishes on any long trip ever. We have 4 kids with many activities, so we tend to spend a lot of time in our car- this tray helps so much and our toddler loves that it is her favorite color- blue. Best of all, silicone wipes clean and washes so easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The item is good quality but it's more designed for little kids. Not recommended for older kids. It's a bit too small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of the biggest problems I have right now is when I give my son, a carton of fries, he would instantly throw it on the ground when he’s displeased about something. I was hoping to find something that wouldn’t disturb his iPad on the lap time, as well as an idea for portioning his food. This was the idea!The material is waterproof, and flexible. I love the vibrant, playful color. The cup holder part works like bus clips on cars which I think is brilliant.The actual cup size will shrink a little bit, which makes it hard for my child to use average sippy cups. Other than that, I don’t really have any bad things to say about this. 5 stars!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great car seat tray!
reviews.reviewText: My almost 3-year-old loves this tray! In my husband’s car, the car seat has two drink holders (one on each side). In my car, the car seat only has one drink holder. She likes the car seat with two drink holders because she likes to put her drink in one and her small toys in the other. When she’s in my car, she can’t do that. I’ve been trying to avoid taking my car, to avoid a “terrible two tantrum”, but then came across this. She was SO happy to have this! It fits into the drink holder and stays there without falling out. She has already started using it and has been so happy with it! That makes one happy momma!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Car Seat Tray!
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought on of those orange car seat trays. Didn’t love it. Figured I would give this a try. I am really impressed with this. I fits really nicely into my car seat and is pretty sturdy. My daughter can rip it out if she doesn’t want it in there, but it is much more sturdy and efficient than others I have tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hold really well in the cup holder of the car seat.
reviews.reviewText: A great idea to add extra play room on this small tray. Can be used for snacks/food and for toys. My granddaughters love spreading out their snacks in the compartments and still have room for their small cars and items to play with. This feels very thick and heavy duty like it wont tear or have issues in the future. This is a great find to help along the short and long rides when the toddlers are in a car seat that has a cup holder that can be used to add the tray. Easy to press in and it holds pretty well. The child can not pull it out from within the seat, the 4 year old can get it out when she is standing in the car waiting to get into her seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our nieces car seat because we bought one for our son and love it. But unfortunately it doesn't fit her carseat.
